example.parse: (IP (ADVP (AD 此外)) (PU ，) (NP-SBJ (CP (WHNP-3 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-3)) (VP (PP-PRP (P 因) (NP (CP (WHNP-2 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (VP (PP-DIR (P 向) (NP (NP-PN (NN 房屋) (NN 委员会)) (CC 或) (NP (ADJP (JJ 私人)) (NP (NN 机构))))) (VP (VV 购买) (NP-OBJ (ADJP (JJ 自置)) (NP (NN 居所)))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 住户)))) (VP (MSP 所) (VP (VV 腾空))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 出租) (NN 单位))) (VP (ADVP (AD 亦)) (ADVP (AD 已)) (ADVP (AD 再)) (VP (VSB (VV 分配) (VV 予)) (NP-OBJ (DNP (LCP (NP (NP (ADJP (JJ 公共)) (NP (NN 房屋))) (NP (NN 轮候册))) (LC 上)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 申请人))))))
example.arg: 因 *OP* *T*-2 向 房屋 委员会 或 私人 机构 购买 自置 居所 的 住户

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (PU “) (NN 火箭) (NN 炮) (PU ”)) (VP (LCP-TMP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 腾空))) (LC 后)) (VP (VV 钻进) (AS 了) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHPP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (PP-LOC (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (VV 存放) (NP-OBJ (NN 烟火) (NN 爆竹))))) (DEC 的))) (NP (NN 仓库))))))
